name: Kart Racing 3D - Top Car Racer Chaser Action Rally
name_original: Kart Racing 3D - Top Car Racer Chaser Action Rally
description:
Kart Racing 3D is a fun car racing arcade game in arabic desert with pyramid passage tunnel. Never lose the racing spirit in a beautiful desert storm track with choice of colors of karts to go with it. Race with other AI karts, while collecting the gold coins on your way. Multiple camera views, various car controls like gas pedal, brakes and reverse. Game is a brainteaser for all ages and addictive to dissolving music play. Fire flames, pool/lake water effect, collision of karts and cars physics looks more natural.

Don't miss the action and fun in one 3D racing game.

Key Features:

• Race with other AI cars and collect gold coins
* Day & Night mode
• Various Car Controls like acceleration, reverse and brake.
• 3 different modes of game play - Race and Chase with other AI's, Countdown and Timer
• Pyramid tunnel passage with fire flames and eye catching graphics throughout
• 6 different car camera views
• Map view and rear view mirror
• Absorbing desert theme music for racing
* Fun never stops!
